title: Zelensky’s Message: Ukraine Is Fighting for Good Over Evil
description: One of the Ukrainian leader’s overriding aims is to prevent support for the war from becoming a partisan issue.

title: Zelensky, in Crew Neck and Cargo Pants, Displays Ukraine’s Defiance
description: The outfit offered an immediate visual reminder of the Ukrainian president’s purpose to his people, his fighters, his allies — and, not least, his foe in the Kremlin.

title: Coalition Deal Puts Netanyahu on Brink of Power in Israel
description: After weeks of talks, Benjamin Netanyahu said he had formed a new governing coalition. Once ratified by Parliament, the deal will return him to power at the head of a hard-right alliance.

title: Putin Concedes Military Failings, but Insists Russia Will Fight On
description: Nodding to criticism that his army lacked the basic necessities to wage war, the Russian leader said his government was providing “everything that the army asks for.’’

title: Your Thursday Briefing: Zelensky at the White House
description: Also, Donald Trump’s tax returns show losses during his presidency.

title: President López Obrador Suggests the Attack on Ciro Gómez Leyva Was Staged
description: After assailants shot at Ciro Gómez Leyva in his own neighborhood, President Andrés Manuel López Obrador suggested that the assassination attempt was actually an effort to destabilize the government.

title: What Are Patriot Missiles, and Why Does Ukraine Want Them?
description: The United States is sending its most advanced ground-based missile defense system to Ukraine, as Russia continues to pummel the country with airstrikes.

title: As Ukraine Readies for a Second Year at War, Prospect of Stalemate Looms
description: American officials believe that with Russia bolstering defenses and learning lessons, Ukraine will find it more challenging to retake land.

title: 8 Teenage Girls Charged With Killing a Toronto Man
description: Police said the girls, who ranged from 13 to 16 years old, connected on social media before meeting up, possibly for the first time, on the day of the killing.

title: Putin Vows ‘No Limits’ to Russia’s War Spending
description: The Russian leader’s speech to defense officials was his latest effort to show he has no intention of giving up in the war on Ukraine.

title: 8 Teenage Girls Charged With Killing a Toronto Man
description: Police said the girls, who ranged from 13 to 16 years old, connected on social media before meeting up, possibly for the first time, on the day of the killing.

title: Putin Ally Meets With China’s Top Leader, Signaling Close Ties
description: China has remained a significant, if largely silent, counterweight to the international censure of Russia.

title: Hospitalizing the Homeless
description: New York City’s struggle to get severely mentally ill people off the streets.

title: U.K. Braces Amid Largest Walkout by Ambulance Workers in Decades
description: The industrial action, seeking higher pay and better working conditions, was driven by a cost-of-living crisis and coincides with strikes by rail workers, nurses and others.

title: Live Updates: Zelensky Takes Plea to Congress as Russia Pounds Ukraine’s Cities
description: President Volodymyr Zelensky’s visit to Washington is a bold move as Russian forces regularly target the capital, Kyiv, with missiles and drones. There are signs that both Russia and Ukraine are preparing for new offensives.

title: Electric Cars Are Taking Off, but When Will Battery Recycling Follow?
description: Many companies and investors are eager to recycle batteries but it could take a decade or more before enough used lithium-ion batteries become available.

title: Dark Christmas Signals Tough Times for a Prosperous City in Hungary
description: Dimmed festive lighting at an annual market in the city of Gyor underscores the economic pain being felt across Hungary as energy costs and inflation soar.

title: Read Your Way Through Edinburgh
description: Edinburgh calls to readers, its pearl-grey skies urging them to curl up with a book. Maggie O’Farrell, the author of “Hamnet,” suggests reading that best reflects her city.

title: Zelensky Will Meet With Biden in Washington and Address Congress, Officials Say
description: The visit will be the first time President Volodymyr Zelensky of Ukraine has left his country since Russia invaded in February.

title: Your Wednesday Briefing
description: As the war in Ukraine enters its 11th month, Volodymyr Zelensky is planning to address Congress in person today.

title: Gunman in Canada Condo Shooting Was Being Forced Out of Building
description: The police on Tuesday identified the five people killed in a shooting one day before the gunman was scheduled to appear in court on orders to sell his unit.
